# Pack Images

Place pack WebP images in this folder with the following naming convention:

## Naming Format
`{theme}.webp`

## Required Images:
- `pokemon.webp` - Used for all Pokemon packs (Starter, Collector, Elite, Master)
- `onepiece.webp` - Used for all One-Piece packs (Starter, Collector, Elite, Master)

## Image Specifications:
- Format: WebP
- Recommended size: 129px Ã— 183px (aspect ratio 43:61)
- Same image is used for all packs of the same theme
